title: RDBMS interface
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Go should have an interface for RDBMS since they're a fundamental piece in many
programs. So, the developers would use one only API to access to the majority of the
same functions that are used in whatever RDBMS.

Anything like Perl's DBI interface, and that go-dbi has got:

https://github.com/thomaslee/go-dbi
